doc.title: Bijou Saints
doc.plot: When a young jewel retailer, Kwame Dumas, finds out that Raj, a rich playboy, is receiving stolen African diamonds shipped to the New Orleans dock, he seeks the help of Gordy LeBeau, a retired NOPD officer. Along with a beauty, Sonali, who's the fianc√©e of Raj. And Kwame's best friend, Juan, a tattoo artist. But there's also a group of eager Cajuns, gathered buy a deckhand named Remy that plan to steal the diamonds for themselves.
